bike.description: FACT 10M carbon, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered HT, alloy replaceable derailleur hanger, carbon drive-side dropout

components.description: 1-1/8 - 1 1/2" Threadless, Campy style upper and lower cartridge bearing for tapered HT and steer
Custom Shimano BB-91, OS, press-in bearing
36.9mm clamp, one bolt for carbon frame/post
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
